titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning the vegetation of plants spoken by Sir Kenelme Digby at Greshan College on the 23 of January, 1660 [i.e. 1661] : at a meeting for promoting the philosophical knowledge by experiments.
titleStmt.author: Digby, Kenelm, Sir, 1603-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. for John Dakins ...,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Of the vegetation of plants.
